TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FtpWebResponse extends System.Net.WebResponse

summary.span: 封裝檔案傳輸通訊協定 (File Transfer Protocol，FTP) 伺服器對要求的回應。

span.span: Encapsulates a File Transfer Protocol (FTP) server's response to a request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體呼叫後所取得方法。Instances of are obtained by calling the method. 傳回的物件必須轉換成。The returned object must be cast to an . 當您的應用程式不需要再物件，請呼叫方法來釋放所持有的資源。When your application no longer needs the object, call the method to free the resources held by the . 屬性包含由伺服器傳回的狀態碼和屬性會傳回狀態碼和描述狀態的訊息。The property contains the status code returned by the server, and the property returns the status code and a message that describes the status. 這些屬性所傳回的值變更時，訊息會由伺服器傳回。The values returned by these properties change as the messages are returned by the server. 傳回的要求，例如檔案名稱的清單傳回的任何資料要求，會出現在所傳回的資料流內方法。Any data returned by the request, such as the list of file names returned for a request, is available in the stream returned by the method. 您可以從取得資料流資料的長度屬性。The length of the stream data can be obtained from the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會傳送要求來刪除 FTP 伺服器上的檔案，並顯示來自伺服器的回應至要求的狀態訊息。The following code example sends a request to delete a file on an FTP server and displays the status message from the server's response to the request. 如需其他範例，請參閱的成員和類別。For additional examples, see the members of the and classes. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#4)]

span.span: Gets the message sent by the FTP server when a connection is established prior to logon.

value.span: ，包含伺服器傳送的橫幅訊息，如果未傳送訊息，則為 。

span.span: A that contains the banner message sent by the server; otherwise, if no message is sent.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放回應所持有的資源。

span.span: Frees the resources held by the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會關閉所傳回的資料流方法如果屬性是`false`。The method closes the data stream returned by the method if the property is `false`. 期間關閉，資料可能會傳送至上控制連線的伺服器中。During the close, data might be sent to the server on the control connection. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會從伺服器下載資料時，會讀取回應資料流的資料，然後關閉它。The following code example downloads data from a server, reads the data from the response stream, and then closes it. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ContentLength As Long
public: virtual property long ContentLength { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得從 FTP 伺服器接收之資料的長度。

span.span: Gets the length of the data received from the FTP server.

value.span: 值，包含從 FTP 伺服器接收之資料的位元組數。

span.span: An value that contains the number of bytes of data received from the FTP server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks FTP 伺服器中，傳回回應資料流時屬性包含的資料流中的位元組數目。When a response stream is returned by the FTP server, the property contains the number of bytes in the stream. 如果在回應中傳回任何資料，或伺服器未傳送的內容長度的資訊，請不傳回 − 1。 returns −1 if no data was returned in the response or if the server did not send content length information. 傳回值是大於或等於零，如果資料應該已傳回。The return value is greater than or equal to zero if data was or should have been returned. 例如，針對要求使用欄位中，屬性一律會傳回 − 1。For example, for requests that use the field, the property always returns −1. 對於要求使用方法，屬性一律為零。For requests that use the method, the property is always zero. 對於要求使用方法，小於或等於零，如果屬性為下載的檔案包含的資料，且如果它是空則為零。For requests that use the method, the property is greater than zero if the downloaded file contained data and is zero if it was empty. 對於要求使用方法，傳回伺服器上的指定檔案的大小。For requests that use the method, returns the size of the specified file on the server. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會下載從指定的 FTP 伺服器上的檔案。The following code example downloads a file from on the specified FTP server. 此屬性包含在下載檔案的位元組數目。This property contains the number of bytes in the downloaded file. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#9)]

summary.span: 取得 FTP 工作階段結束時伺服器所傳送的訊息。

span.span: Gets the message sent by the server when the FTP session is ending.

value.span: ，包含伺服器傳送的結束訊息，如果未傳送訊息，則為 。

span.span: A that contains the exit message sent by the server; otherwise, if no message is sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性才可以使用伺服器的連線已關閉或重複使用。The property is not available until the connection to the server is closed or reused. 如果屬性是`true`，這項要求所使用的連接未關閉，這可防止伺服器傳送結束訊息。If the property is `true`, the connection used by this request is not closed, which prevents the server from sending an exit message. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclFtpClient#17](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#17)] [!code-csharp[NclFtpClient#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.IO.Stream GetResponseStream() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetResponseStream () As Stream

summary.span: 擷取包含從 FTP 伺服器傳送之回應資料的資料流。

span.span: Retrieves the stream that contains response data sent from an FTP server.

returns.span: 可讀取的 執行個體，包含與回應一起傳回的資料，如果伺服器未傳回回應資料，則為 。

span.span: A readable instance that contains data returned with the response; otherwise, if no response data was returned by the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在讀取資料之後, 您必須關閉資料流。After reading the data, you must close the stream. 當您關閉時，會自動關閉資料流包含它的物件。The stream is automatically closed when you close the object that contains it. 除非要求方法是，會擲回例外狀況或。An exception is thrown unless the request method is or . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得回應資料流要求。The following code example demonstrates getting the response stream for a request. span.span: The response did not return a data stream.

summary.span: 取得 FTP 伺服器上檔案最近修改的日期和時間。

span.span: Gets the date and time that a file on an FTP server was last modified.

value.span: ，包含檔案最近修改的日期和時間。

span.span: A that contains the last modified date and time for a file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回所要求資料方法。The property returns the data requested by the method. 使用任何其他方法，傳送的要求傳回。For requests sent using any other method, returns . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的日期和上次修改的檔案到 FTP 伺服器上的時間。The following code example displays the date and time that a file on an FTP server was last modified. remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為伺服器和資源特定的行為，例如，重新導向，而傳回的值屬性不一定與所傳回的值相同屬性。Because of server- and resource-specific behaviors, such as redirection, the value returned by the property is not always the same as the value returned by the property. 對於要求使用方法，傳回的伺服器上的檔案名稱。For requests that use the method, returns the name of the file on the server. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. summary.span: 取得從 FTP 伺服器傳送的最新狀態碼。

span.span: Gets the most recent status code sent from the FTP server.

value.span: 值，指示與回應一起傳回的最新狀態碼。

span.span: An value that indicates the most recent status code returned with this response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的值屬性包含在屬性。The value returned by the property is included in the property. 當您要下載資料，值FTP 伺服器所傳回狀態碼會變更。When you are downloading data, the value of changes as status codes are returned by the FTP server. 在您呼叫後方法，包含的中繼狀態碼。After you call the method, contains an intermediate status code. 當您呼叫方法，包含最終的狀態。When you call the method, contains the final status. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將檔案上傳至伺服器，並顯示狀態。The following code example uploads a file to a server and displays the status. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#2)]

value.span: 執行個體，包含與這個回應一起傳回的狀態碼和訊息。

span.span: A instance that contains the status code and message returned with this response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的文字屬性包含 3 位數屬性值。The text returned by the property includes the 3-digit property value. 下載 windows 7 的資料時FTP 伺服器所傳回狀態碼會變更。When downloading data, the value of changes as status codes are returned by the FTP server. 在您呼叫後方法，包含的中繼狀態碼。After you call the method, contains an intermediate status code. 當您呼叫方法，包含最終的狀態。When you call the method, contains the final status. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會傳送要求來刪除 FTP 伺服器上的檔案，並顯示來自伺服器的回應至要求的狀態訊息。The following code example sends a request to delete a file on an FTP server and displays the status message from the server's response to the request. summary.span: 取得驗證完成時 FTP 伺服器所傳送的訊息。

span.span: A that contains the welcome message sent by the server; otherwise, if no message is sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果連接正在重複使用 (屬性設定為`true`)，則屬性會傳回與連接收到的第一個 歡迎使用訊息。If the connection is being reused (the property is set to `true`), the property returns the first welcome message received with the connection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property.
